name: Reap What You Sow (Cassette Ghoul)
description:
You're dead.

And that pretty much sucks, but a mysterious benefactor has offered you a deal. If you can find it within your immortal soul to cultivate tiny seedlings into horrific, hellish plants, perhaps you can make your way back to the mortal plane.

Things may not always be so straightforward, however, as the Underworld contains several...unique...challenges one must face during horticultural activities.

Reap What You Sow is a gardening game based in random events. Each game is unique and offers different plants, items, and events.

Made for the 2022 UNC Collegiate Game Jam by CassetteGhoul.
